00011 ORFileWriter::ORFileWriter(string label)
00012 {
00013   fLabel = label;
00014   fSavedName = "";
00015   fFile = NULL;
00016 }
00017 
00018 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORFileWriter::StartRun()
00019 {
00020   if(fFile != NULL) {
00021     if(UpdateFilePointer() == NULL) {
00022       ORLog(kError) << "Lost track of fFile!" << endl;
00023       return kFailure;
00024     }
00025     fFile->Close();
00026     delete fFile;
00027   }
00028   if (!fRunContext) {
00029     ORLog(kError) << "fRunContext is NULL!" << endl;
00030     return kFailure;
00031   }
00032   string filename = fLabel + ::Form("_run%d.root", fRunContext->GetRunNumber());
00033   fFile = new TFile(filename.c_str(), "RECREATE");
00034   fSavedName = fFile->GetName();
00035   fSavedName.erase( fSavedName.size() - 5, 5 ); // Removing .root from the end
00036 
00037   TObjString headerXML(fRunContext->GetHeader()->GetRawXML().Data());
00038   headerXML.Write("headerXML");
00039 
00040   return kSuccess;
00041 }
00042 
00043 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORFileWriter::EndRun()
00044 {
00045   if(fFile == NULL) {
00046     ORLog(kWarning) << "EndRun(): ending a run that never began!" << endl;
00047     return kBreak;
00048   }
00049 
00050   if(UpdateFilePointer() == NULL) {
00051     ORLog(kError) << "Lost track of fFile!" << endl;
00052     return kFailure;
00053   }
00054   fFile->cd();
00055   // other processors will write their data after this processor; close the file at
00056   // the beginning of the next run or at the end of processing.
00057   return kSuccess;
00058 }
00059 
00060 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORFileWriter::EndProcessing()
00061 {
00062   if(fFile == NULL) {
00063     ORLog(kWarning) << "EndProcessing(): no file was open!" << endl;
00064     return kBreak;
00065   } 
00066   if(UpdateFilePointer() == NULL) {
00067     ORLog(kError) << "Lost track of fFile!" << endl;
00068     return kFailure;
00069   }
00070   fFile->Close();
00071   delete fFile;
00072   return kSuccess;
00073 }
00074 
00075 TFile* ORFileWriter::UpdateFilePointer()
00076 {
00077   TSeqCollection* listOfFiles = gROOT->GetListOfFiles();
00078   if(listOfFiles->IndexOf(fFile) == -1) {
00079     // fFile has been deleted by stupid ROOT. Search for the updated pointer
00080     fFile = NULL;
00081     for(int i=0; fFile == NULL && i<=listOfFiles->LastIndex(); i++) {
00082       TFile* file = (TFile*) listOfFiles->At(i);
00083       std::string nameOfFile = file->GetName();
00084       if ( nameOfFile.find( fSavedName ) != string::npos ) {
00085         fFile = file;
00086         break;
00087       }
00088     }
00089   }
00090   // If the updated pointer is not found, fFile is NULL here. Could be a
00091   // bug, let the calling function decide.
00092   return fFile;
00093 }
